anime.title: Attack on Titan
anime.description: Eren Yeager and his friends join the Survey Corps to fight the monstrous Titans.

anime.title: Demon Slayer
anime.description: Tanjiro Kamado sets out to save his sister Nezuko after she is turned into a demon.

anime.title: Naruto
anime.description: Naruto Uzumaki dreams of becoming the strongest ninja and the leader of his village.

anime.title: One Piece
anime.description: Monkey D. Luffy sails the seas to find the legendary treasure One Piece.

anime.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
anime.description: Yuji Itadori joins a secret organization to fight cursed spirits.

anime.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
anime.japanese_title: 鋼の錬金術師 FULLMETAL ALCHEMIST
anime.description: Two brothers search for the Philosopher's Stone after a failed alchemy experiment.

anime.title: Death Note
anime.description: A high school student gains the power to kill anyone by writing their name in a notebook.

anime.title: Tokyo Ghoul
anime.description: A college student is transformed into a half-ghoul and struggles to survive.

anime.title: My Hero Academia
anime.japanese_title: 僕のヒーローアカデミア
anime.description: In a world where most people have powers, a powerless boy dreams of becoming a hero.

anime.title: Bleach
anime.description: Ichigo Kurosaki gains the powers of a Soul Reaper and fights evil spirits.

anime.title: Chainsaw Man
anime.description: Denji, a young man with a chainsaw demon inside him, becomes a devil hunter to pay off his debts.

anime.title: Spy x Family
anime.description: A spy, an assassin, and a telepath form a fake family for a mission.

anime.title: Blue Lock
anime.description: Japan launches a radical soccer training program to create the ultimate striker.

anime.title: Oshi no Ko
anime.description: A doctor and his patient are reincarnated into the entertainment world with secrets to uncover.

anime.title: Hell's Paradise
anime.description: Condemned criminals are sent to a mysterious island in search of the elixir of life.

anime.title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End
anime.description: An elf mage reflects on her long life after her hero's journey ends.

anime.title: Ranking of Kings
anime.description: A small deaf prince sets out to prove himself as a worthy king.

anime.title: The Apothecary Diaries
anime.description: A young woman in the imperial court uses her knowledge of medicine to solve mysteries.

anime.title: Mashle: Magic and Muscles
anime.description: In a world of magic, a boy with no magic trains his body to become a magic-crushing powerhouse.

anime.title: My Dress-Up Darling
anime.japanese_title: その着せ替え人形は恋をする
anime.description: A high school boy and a girl bond over their passion for cosplay.

anime.title: Re:Zero - Starting Life in Another World
anime.japanese_title: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活
anime.description: A young man is transported to another world where he relives his death over and over.

anime.title: Erased
anime.description: A man is sent back to his childhood to prevent a series of kidnappings and murders.

anime.title: Paranoia Agent
anime.description: A mysterious assailant on rollerblades is linked to a series of strange events.

anime.title: Steins;Gate
anime.japanese_title: シュタインズ・ゲート
anime.description: A group of friends accidentally invent time travel and face the consequences.

anime.title: Made in Abyss
anime.description: A young girl and a robot boy descend into a mysterious and dangerous abyss.

anime.title: The Devil is a Part-Timer!
anime.description: A demon lord ends up in modern Tokyo and works at a fast-food restaurant.

anime.title: Noragami
anime.description: A minor god takes odd jobs for five yen while helping a human girl with supernatural problems.

anime.title: Akame ga Kill!
anime.description: An assassin group fights against a corrupt empire.

anime.title: Black Clover
anime.description: Two orphans strive to become the Wizard King in a world of magic.

anime.title: Dr. Stone
anime.description: After humanity turns to stone, a genius scientist sets out to rebuild civilization.

anime.title: Overlord
anime.description: A player trapped in a virtual game world becomes an undead overlord.

anime.title: No Game No Life
anime.japanese_title: ノーゲーム・ノーライフ
anime.description: Two gamer siblings are transported to a world where everything is decided by games.

anime.title: Sword Art Online
anime.japanese_title: ソードアート・オンライン
anime.description: Players trapped in a VRMMORPG must clear all 100 floors to escape.

anime.title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
anime.japanese_title: 転生したらスライムだった件
anime.description: A man reincarnates into a slime in a fantasy world and gains unique powers.

anime.title: The Rising of the Shield Hero
anime.japanese_title: 盾の勇者の成り上がり
anime.description: A man summoned to another world becomes the Shield Hero and faces betrayal.

anime.title: Jobless Reincarnation
anime.description: A man reincarnates in a fantasy world with the determination to live his new life to the fullest.

anime.title: Guilty Crown
anime.description: A boy gains a mysterious power that allows him to extract weapons from people's hearts.

anime.title: Ergo Proxy
anime.description: In a dystopian future, a woman investigates mysterious android-related murders.

anime.title: Terror in Resonance
anime.description: Two teenage terrorists play a deadly game of cat and mouse with the police.

anime.title: Baccano!
anime.description: An ensemble of characters in 1930s America get caught up in an immortal conspiracy.
